function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Calculation of floating virus particles in the room","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 infection due to increased viral load in the built environment","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air filtration systems, reducing occupancy density, and implementing air disinfection technologies","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C germicidal irradiation, and air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Exponential increase of newly infected people over time in confined spaces","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 within confined spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing strict occupancy limits, promoting mask-wearing, and enhancing cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, air quality sensors, and disinfection robots","People":"Occupants of confined spaces (e.g., supermarkets, airplanes, cars)","Owner":"Business owners, transportation authorities, and public health agencies"}]}
